歎ずる: (たんずる) - to grieve; to lament; to sigh in admiration
歎声: (たんせい) - sigh (of admiration or lamentation)
歎息: (たんそく) - sigh; grief; lamentation; deploring
歓び: (よろこび) - joy; delight; rapture; pleasure; gratification; rejoicing; congratulations; felicitations
歓ぶ: (よろこぶ) - to be delighted/to be glad/to be pleased; to congratulate; to gratefully accept
歓を尽くす: (かんをつくす) - to enjoy oneself to one's hearts content; to enjoy oneself to the full
歓喜天: (かんぎてん) - Nandikesvara (Ganesh in the Buddhist pantheon)
歓天喜地: (かんてんきち) - (yoji) great joy; jubilation; exultation
歓待: (かんたい) - warm welcome; friendly reception; hospitality; entertainment
歓心を買う: (かんしんをかう) - to win favour; to win favor
歓送迎会: (かんそうげいかい) - party to welcome (e.g. new employees) and send off (e.g. retiring employees)
止す: (よす) - to cease; to desist; to cut it out; to lay off (an activity); to drop (a subject) to abolish; to resign; to give up
止まない: (やまない) - (after the -te form of a verb)  always/forever; very/greatly (esp. of hopes and desires)
止まり: (どまり) - stopping at; going no further than
止まる: (とどまる) - to remain/to abide/to stay (in the one place); to be limited to/to be confined to
止まるところを知らない: (とどまるところをしらない) - knowing no bounds; showing no signs of stopping or slowing down
止む: (やむ) - to cease; to stop; to be over
止むかたなし: (やむかたなし) - it cannot be helped; there is no other way
止むなく: (やむなく) - reluctantly; unwillingly; unavoidably; out of necessity
止むに止まれず: (やむにやまれず) - without being able to help oneself; against one's will; compelling; pressing; irresistible
止むに止まれない: (やむにやまれない) - without being able to help oneself; against one's will; compelling; pressing; irresistible
止むに止まれぬ: (やむにやまれぬ) - without being able to help oneself; against one's will; compelling; pressing; irresistible
止むに止まれぬ事情: (やむにやまれぬじじょう) - circumstances beyond one's control
止むを得ず: (やむをえず) - unavoidably; inevitably; necessarily; reluctantly; against one's will
止むを得ない: (やむをえない) - cannot be helped; unavoidable
止む得ず: (やむえず) - unavoidably; inevitably; necessarily; reluctantly; against one's will
止む方なし: (やむかたなし) - it cannot be helped; there is no other way
止む無く: (やむなく) - reluctantly; unwillingly; unavoidably; out of necessity
止む終えない: (やむおえない) - (incorrect variant of やむを得ない)  cannot be helped; unavoidable
止む負えない: (やむおえない) - (incorrect variant of やむを得ない)  cannot be helped; unavoidable
止めくぎ: (とめくぎ) - stop peg; toggle; tack
止めておく: (やめておく) - to pass/to pass on/to give (something) a miss; to cut it out/to knock off (for the day)/to let the matter drop
止めになる: (やめになる) - to be given up; to be discontinued
止める: (とどめる) - to stop/to stay (e.g. the night)/to cease/to put an end to; to contain/to keep (in position, in place)/to limit; to record (e.g. a fact)/to retain
止めを刺す: (とどめをさす) - to finish off/to ensure (something) is dead/to deliver the coup de grace; to put an end to/to deliver the final blow; (as ＡはＢに止めを刺す) to be the best for A
止め具: (とめぐ) - latch; clasp; catch; check; fastener
止め椀: (とめわん) - soup served at the end of a traditional Japanese dinner; last soup served in a Kaiseki course (often miso soup)
止め男: (とめおとこ) - tout; arbitrator (esp. in a play)
止め釘: (とめくぎ) - stop peg; toggle; tack
止め鋏: (とめばさみ) - {sumo} final cut severing a wrestler's top-knot in his retirement ceremony
止り: (どまり) - stopping at; going no further than
止る: (とまる) - to stop (moving)/to come to a stop; to stop (doing, working, being supplied)/to come to a halt/to cease/to be stopped/to be suspended; to alight/to perch on
止ん事ない: (やんごとない) - high class; esteemed; cherished
止ん事無い: (やんごとない) - high class; esteemed; cherished
止偏: (とめへん) - kanji "stop" radical at left
止具: (とめぐ) - latch; clasp; catch; check; fastener
止椀: (とめわん) - soup served at the end of a traditional Japanese dinner; last soup served in a Kaiseki course (often miso soup)
止水: (しすい) - stagnant water/still water; water stopping
止水栓: (しすいせん) - stop cock; stop valve; curb cock; shut-off valve
止男: (とめおとこ) - tout; arbitrator (esp. in a play)
止血法: (しけつほう) - hemostatic method; styptic treatment; stanching
止血鉗子: (しけつかんし) - artery forceps; hemostatic forceps
止観: (しかん) - calm abiding and clear observation (Tendai meditation); Tendai
